table.name: purchase_order
table.update: update purchase_order <set> <if test="#{discount,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=NUMERIC} != null"> discount = #{discount} ,</if> <if test="#{extraQuantity,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=NUMERIC} != null"> quantity = quantity + #{extraQuantity} ,</if> <if test="#{shippingType,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=NUMERIC} != null"> shipping_type = #{shippingType} ,</if> </set> <where> <if test="#{foodType,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=NUMERIC} != null"> food_type = #{foodType} </if> <if test="#{zipCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} != null"> AND zip_code = #{zipCode} </if> <if test="#{orderDate,javaType=java.sql.Date,jdbcType=DATE} != null"> AND order_date = #{orderDate} </if> </where>
